name: UnderShell
description:
UnderShell  is a casual game where you experience the story of a turtle under the sea that meets other turtles to repeat the life cycle.

how to play: As a baby turtle use A and D to rotate the turtle and W to move

Inside the sea how to play: Use A and D to move Horizontal, Space to swim, K key tho shoot stars.

Music and sound design:
Igor Veríssimo
igveri@gmail.com
https://soundcloud.com/igor-verissimo
